articles.title: New women's wing at Yellowstone County jail is almost ready for inmates

articles.description: Nicholas Aulg, 14, of Willamina is accused of murder, first-degree arson and first-degree aggravated theft. Jacob Brooks, 15, of Willamina is being held on suspicion of attempted first-degree arson and first-degree aggravated theft.

articles.description: The mom of a baby that was found dead in Chesterfield County is accused of stuffing her daughter’s body in a garbage bag, then in a diaper box and hiding it in the woods. Sheriff’s Deputies charged her with improper disposal of human remains.
